Title: Tina Tailor Soldier Spy
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Holly Schlesinger
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: After being pestered by the kids and a mistake by Gretchen, Linda decides to dye her hair full blonde. Meanwhile, when trying to quit the Thunder Girls Tina is asked to find a mole in the troop.
